H0.text: where is the scottish house in skyfall. Highlands

H1.text: where is the scottish house in skyfall. Glencoe

H2.text: where is the scottish house in skyfall. Isle of Skye

H3.text: where is the scottish house in skyfall. Celts

A4.text: Bond uses his Aston Martin DB5 to take M to Skyfall, his childhood home in the Scottish Highlands.

A5.text: The finale was planned for Duntrune Castle in Argyll, but shortly after filming began the location was changed to Glencoe.
